data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 955 believers in Monaghan against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Monaghan, Ireland

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Monaghan to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Monaghan, Ireland.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Monaghan, Ireland.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Monaghan, Ireland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Monaghan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Monaghan, Ireland, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Monaghan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
